text: Contact Hypothesis « Contact hypothesis: theory that contact between groups is an effective means of reducing prejudice between them « Contact usually necessary but not sufficient o From Sherif et al. Robber’s Cave Experiment: o Groups need each other o Groups have common superordinate goal - o Groups work together with equal status o Contact hospitable and free from emotional interaction o Contact lasts for a significant period of time o Norms governing situation promote harmony and mutual respect
